title: New York Times Buys Wordle to Diversify Revenue Sources
itunes:title: New York Times Buys Wordle to Diversify Revenue Sources
description:
Dr. Kevin Ramdas, Director of Medical Affairs at Longeveron, discusses developing long-term therapies for the treatment of Covid. Bloomberg News Media Reporter Gerry Smith reports on the New York Times buying Wordle in a push to expand their games business. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Federal Reserve Reporter Matt Boesler talk about how U.S. rent inflation has room to run as landlords regain leverage. Trulieve CEO Kim Rivers discusses strong growth for the cannabis operator and the outlook for federal reform. And we Drive to the Close with David Dietze, Senior Portfolio Strategist at Peapack Private Wealth Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
